description: The order will be executed at the company's manufacturing facility at Bangalore, which has an installed capacity to process 250 tonnes of jewellery per annum.
title: Rajesh Exports bags Rs 653 crore order from Singapore

description: Upadhye will replace Umang Vohra, who will continue to be the Global Chief Operating Officer, it added.
title: Cipla board approves appointment of Kedar Upadhye as GlobalCFO

description: MTNL, unlike BSNL and other private sector operators, won’t be able to offer fourth-generation or 4G LTE-based services to subscribers anytime soon as the company does not have liberalized spectrum and its licenses are expiring in 2017.
title: BSNL CMD: Likely to get nod soon to run MTNL’s mobile services

description: Telit Wednesday entered into a ​strategic alliance with WE Components India to develop new business opportunities in the Internet of Things (IoT) domain.
title: Telit, WE Components team up for IoT business

description: Cipla said in a June 8 announcement to stock exchanges, Kedar Upadhye will be joining the organization as its Global chief financial officer.
title: Cipla hires Kedar Upadhye from Dr. Reddy's as global CFO

description: Exports of jewellery have also fallen by about 17 per cent i.e. from $13.2 bn in 2014-15 to $11 bn in 2015-16. Dubai and Thailand are fast emerging as major jewellery manufacturing hub.
title: Extend incentives in gems and jewellery exports: Assocham urges government

description: Telecom stocks today gained up to 3.4 per cent after the inter-ministerial panel Telecom Commission backed lowering of spectrum usage charge to 3 per cent of their annual revenue from next auction.
title: Telcos edge higher on lower spectrum usage charge

description: Siemens Ltd today said that it has won an order worth around Rs 113 crore from Power Grid Company of Bangladesh to design, procure, supply.
title: Siemens wins order worth Rs 113 crore from PGCB

description: Company's stock was a top percentage gainer on the NSE index.
title: Bharti Airtel rises 2% on new spectrum usage fee

description: Research firm Gartner Wednesday said that the smartphone sales worldwide will continue to slow and would no longer to grow in double digits ​though it estimates ​a ​29% year-on-year growth ​for India.
title: Global smartphone sales to slow, but India growth healthy: Gartner

description: The build-up has resulted in the NSE putting the contracts under ban in derivatives for exceeding the permissible limit of positions in the counter.
title: Reliance Communications OI hits a 10-year high on talk of delay in tower biz sale

description: In West Bengal, the initiative will initially be rolled out to cover over 400 villages in Purulia district with an objective to reach 1 lakh women, the companies said in a joint statement.
title: Google, Tata Trusts launch `Internet Sathi' in West Bengal to empower rural women

description: Air service to the Himachal capital was suspended 44 months back after carriers claimed that the service was unviable.
title: Air connectivity in Shimla to resume from tomorrow

description: Xiaomi with its flagship affordable fitness tracker Mi Band has attained a top position with a 27.1% market share in Q1 2016 in the wearable category in India
title: Xiaomi pips Samsung, Motorola to become a top wearable vendor in India

description: The company will focus on dermatology as the fourth engine of growth for its OTC business, Sun Pharma said in a filing to BSE.
title: Sun Pharma enters dermatology segment to expand retail offering
